profile.title: Yus Profayl
profile.mustLogin: Yu fo log in bifo yu fit si di setin dem.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Sho di orijin an di translet mesij
profile.filterExplicit: Blok bad or naked tin dem
profile.enableReadReceipts: Mek pipul si wen yu don rid di mesij
profile.allowExplicitContent: Alao bad or naked tin dem
profile.disappearingMessages: Mek mesij dem go we afta som taym
profile.saveError: Eror: Wi nor fit sef di setin
profile.noPrivateKey: No praivet ki de pan dis divais fo export.
profile.setBackupPassword: Put paswod fo kip yu bakɔp seif:
profile.backupDownloaded: Yu bakɔp don download wit enkripshɔn.
profile.enterBackupPassword: Put di paswod we yu bin yus fo dis bakɔp:
profile.importSuccess: Praivet ki don komot kam insay dis divais.
profile.importFailed: Import nor wok (rong paswod o file don bad).
profile.keysRotated: Nyu ki don mek an public ki don upload.
profile.rotateFailed: Nor able fo mek nyu ki.
profile.exportKey: Kɔpi yu praivet ki go aot
profile.importKey: Tek bak di enkrip bakɔp ki
profile.keyDisclaimer: Yu praivet ki nor de liv dis divais. Mek wan kopi we get paswod fo yus am pan oda divais.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Fɔwad kɔl an text we de kam na yu veri-fay fɔn o email. Wen yu kɔl or text bɔdiy, dem kin si yu Chatforia nɔmba.

chat.selectPrompt: Chuz wan text ɔ chat rum fo stat tok
